Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from GenAI was often very general and non-specific, it did not impact my learning as I did not incorporate its feedback into my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I find feedback from my teacher extremely important, compared to feedback from GenAI which feels so insignificant.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from GenAI would often considerably compliment my work, even when it did not deserve to, often making me dismiss its comments.
